amendment.description: Amendment expands the scope of the Assistance to Firefighter Grants program to allow the purchase of equipment that reduces the amount of water used in fighting fires and training firefighters.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 111-340 to expand the scope of the Assistance to Firefighter Grants program to allow the purchase of equipment that reduces the use of water in fighting fires and training firefighters.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
